title: Home
text:
Welcome to my home page.
I am a PhD researcher at the Software Engineering & Technology group, TU Eindhoven. I received my masterâ€™s degree from the Informatics program, Institut Teknologi Bandung.
My academic parents are prof.dr. Michel Chaudron and dr. Lina Ochoa.
Email me at s.a.rukmono at the domain where I am doing my PhD (for research thingies) or satrio at the domain rukmono.id (for other things).
Feel free to browse around!
